data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arachchige, Gayashan M., Jayakody, Sevvandi, Mooi, Rich, Kroh, Andreas (2019): Taxonomy and distribution of irregular echinoids (Echinoidea: Irregularia) from Sri Lanka. Zootaxa 4541 (1): 1-100, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4541.1.1|10 occurrences
